channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 07:41 Dumping anxiety in the Rivne region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 07:41 Dumping anxiety in the Rivne region.Creck on further messages.#Rivne_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 07:40 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack
item.description: 🟠 07:40 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 07:40 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
